name: neutron-ui
description: A highly accessible and easily customizable UI library.
author: Lucas Castro <lucas.castro@gmail.com>

scripts.build:lib: yarn workspace @withneutron/quarks build:lib && yarn workspace @withneutron/quarks-react build:lib
scripts.watch:lib: yarn workspace @withneutron/quarks build:lib && concurrently -c "yellow,magenta" -n "quarks,quarks-react" "yarn workspace @withneutron/quarks run watch:lib" "yarn workspace @withneutron/quarks-react run watch:lib"
scripts.watch:lib:all: yarn workspace @withneutron/quarks build:lib && concurrently -c "yellow,magenta,cyan" -n "quarks,quarks-react,ui" "yarn workspace @withneutron/quarks run watch:lib" "yarn workspace @withneutron/quarks-react run watch:lib" "yarn workspace @withneutron/ui run watch:lib"
scripts.cypress: start-server-and-test 'yarn run dev' http-get://localhost:3000 'yarn run cy:run'
